d1_flags: 1. goto C83E3C if GOT_DIAMOND is set
d1_text:
Npc0961:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GOT_DIAMOND L_C83E3C]
ï¿½What happened to those guys digging for the buried gold?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If they found the gold, it would be worth a huge amount of money.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½They'd be able to pay off a million dollar debt very easily.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If I were them, I'd go to Japan and live it up![HALT][END]
